content.label:
Brilliant! This game is simple but challenging. But most of all it‚Äôs ELEGANT. There are lots of word unscrambling or jumble puzzles that are very good but this is head and shoulders above the rest. From it‚Äôs concept through to its presentation this game is thoughtful, creative, beautiful and a joy to play. Even the tumbling way that the letters are manipulated draws you into the play. If I could I would give it ten stars.

The only hitch is that if you miss the free daily puzzle there‚Äôs no going back to past games.
Gameplay is pretty fun but I‚Äôm not gonna drop multiple dollars on it

I actually am not crazy about the regular puzzles in this game, but I do love playing the clue puzzles. I just wish there were more of them (and that they weren't so expensive). I downloaded the app about a month ago and I am almost done playing through all the clue puzzle packs. I also wishHints were available for the clue puzzles. When you get stuck, there is no way of getting unstuck short of asking someone for help.

I have loved playing this game for several years now. It‚Äôs part of my morning routine. Today, however, I was shocked to find that the first word in today‚Äôs daily puzzle (Sunday, Oct. 4, 2020) that I could solve was the offense term ‚Äúdarkies,‚Äù one used to refer to people of color, especially Black persons. Please be more careful to not use offensive terms in your puzzles. This one instance wont‚Äôt make me stop playing at this point ‚Äî I just wanted to point it out. Thank you.

I love this game.  It can be very challenging and I appreciate that in a word game.   This game has ads AND iaps. If you bought all of the ‚Äúpacks‚Äù, you‚Äôd be forking over $20.  Seems steep to me.
Fun game but why is it reading info from my clipboard??

The developer definitely was a bit greedy. The game is set up as a way to get the player to buy IAP to unlock more levels as more than 95% of the game is locked behind Payable ‚Äúlevel packs‚Äù it would have been so much better for this game to cost, let‚Äôs say, $4 with more levels unlocked to the player. It seems like a cash grab and is kinda sad because this developer could come to mind as a quality developer if they weren‚Äôt so obviously trying to get the player to buy into the game once it‚Äôs installed and not before.

title.label: Fun game but cannot restore purchases.

content.label: I had to wipe my phone and now I cannot restore my purchases to remove ads. Contacted support via email but got no answer.
I love this game, especially the Clue puzzles. But I haven‚Äôt seen a new one on over a year?  What‚Äôs up??

I use this app on a daily basis. I think the puzzles are fun. I didn‚Äôt like the ads so I upgraded or purchased a pack. I have noticed the general stats have stopped updating - I guess at the 218th puzzle as I have played more than 500 days - something is amiss.
The daily puzzle stats seem to be correct ( on the top half of the stats page).
Every ad for Apple Arcade goes to the App Store without being touched. Only had an option to go back to Safari, and then have to close out and reopen game tab. Pretty tedious; only complaint though.

Love this game! So unique and fun. Two things - can you please offer more clue packs and bundles for them? I can‚Äôt justify $1.99 for 20 puzzles I‚Äôll solve within a day. Also why can‚Äôt we use hints ok clue puzzles? That would be helpful.

02-17-20 Wow, no updates on this games! Why? I see daily games, that's it! We would like to see if you would flip the game so our charging cord doesn't bend when playing this game when it's plugged in! Thanks!

Why does this game keeps freezing up?? This keeps up, i'll be deleting it!! 02/06/20

I don't mind watching ads, but please when the ads is over, have a X so we can leave the ad. I refused to hit on the ad to lead us to ad's website!

title.label: Would be good if they were real words

content.label: The mechanics are a lot of fun, but the puzzles have answers that aren‚Äôt words. ‚ÄúBotes‚Äù, ‚ÄúMorae‚Äù, ‚ÄúDorab‚Äù? No. The game is linked to Merriam Webster; you‚Äôd think they have some kind of screening mechanism.
Y‚Äôall need to fix your backend database. More than once the app has failed to recognize ‚Äútrinity‚Äù as a word.
Really?? I‚Äôm just playing a game!! Stop political ads.
Love this game. Need more puzzle packs, please. Thank you!

title.label: The ‚Äòtype‚Äô of game worth in-game purchase

content.label: I really enjoy this game. So much that I was irritated by ads between so invested $4 and now more clue packs and no ads. As for the gameplay, it is fun, challenging and easy to get lost in. Going to find more from this developer but if you have it, play it, enjoy it, buy a pack and support the studio.

I purchased several packs when first starting this game.  They do not show up on the packs list now.  Email to the support hasn‚Äôt answered my concerns. I enjoy the daily puzzles and the free packs; would give it a higher rating if it worked and I could receive my purchases.
   It‚Äôs been a couple weeks since I first wrote for support. I have not received any communication from Typeshift.  Don‚Äôt buy any packs or expect any help from the support team.
     Still have not received any support or info on my purchases. Don‚Äôt buy any of the packs!
How do I get the new games packs I paid for.     Not happy.

title.label: Bug in 1 ad makes game hang

content.label: Every time I get the ad for World War Rising I can‚Äôt get back to the game. I can‚Äôt think of any other way to send this message to whoever bundles the ads than a review. Please fix the glitch, Professors.
However, would love to see *core words* in the daily puzzles. I solve them, but quite often with different words and it would be really interesting to see the words I‚Äôve missed.
It amazes me to see how many new words have be added to the dictionary, excited on what‚Äôs to come.

Occult scoring/rating process, but really entertaining word puzzles.  Fun, challenging, frustrating.  Pleasure has not worn off over time; in fact without strict rationing they‚Äôd all have been used up weeks ago.  Wish there were more ...

Oh wow. I tried playing this game but there were so many ads and I couldn‚Äôt find a way to pay to remove them. Today the game was in an App Store story about indiegames and I decided to read the whole developer notes, to see if things had changed. To mu surprise, I realized any 99c purchase would have removed the ads. Happy to pay for this game, and get some bonus puzzles, too.

Needs on-screen word definitions. There's plenty of room on the screen for that, and I hate switching over to Safari to do a Google search every time I build a weird word I've never heard before.

EDIT: Turns out you can get definitions after the fact on the winning screen. Better than Googling, but still slightly clunky.
Twice it froze my phone completely. üò° I really enjoyed it until then. At first I could not even restart it.
What I wish they‚Äôd change is their notification system: I get notification badges even when I solved the Daily Game. As a person who runs ‚ÄúInbox Zero,‚Äù I find this highly annoying...
I don't understand the scoring at all, but I enjoy the daily challenge puzzle. Fun workout for a word puzzle fan.

What is so irritating is paying big bucks for 20 puzzles and then one of those puzzles is a lazy, sloppy, ill-conceived, MISSPELLED versions of words. What malpractice for a ‚Äúdictionary‚Äù company to promote poor spelling. AND I HAVE TO PAY FOR IT. 

And here is the good news, when the words are spelled correctly, this game is the most fun in the world. But for the packs full of misspellings, this would be my favorite game. (And you should warn us when we‚Äôre paying for a misspelled word.)

The pack they give you for free, to try and entice you to pay for other packs, is not all the fun. I get the hints are supposed to not just give it away but it should be better tailored to the word than they are. Fun concept though. I‚Äôll just stick to the daily challenges. üôÑ

Do you enjoy having your ipad suddenly blare ads? No, neither do I.

Enjoyed the games for several days. Then I realized a few things: I could resolve puzzles by finding words that weren‚Äôt the core words, some words that earned credit weren‚Äôt words, not even the in-app dictionary, and some words which I unscrambled did not earn credit, despite being actual correctly spelled words.  The app does count words that have been archaic since the 12 century (doubtful most of us or the app developers know those words), spellings and words that are rare, lesser known variants of words, technical words, and words specific to certain specialized disciplines and knowledge areas.

I just got bored and would simply roll around the letters until the game declared I‚Äôd made a word.  Basically, this game is just lazy.

I don‚Äôt understand how apps get the app store spotlight and meet the developers.  Do tell, Apple. Do developers get to pay for that placement?

title.label: Poor word filtering for required words

content.label:
A word puzzle game should NEVER rely on a player finding archaic words that are no longer used.

The second time this happened to me I deleted the app (I challenge you to find a published use of the word ‚Äúlikest‚Äù in the last century). There are too many other good word puzzlers to forgive that.
This app gave me the idea to fill my moat with bears. Thanks for that! Plus, when I finish putting the bears in the moat, I can sit back and have fun playing this game. 10/10 more clue puzzles pls

I love this game and am hooked. I have already played all the packs and wondered when new ones might be available. I keep playing the daily off the app, but when I tried to access the game through the Miriam Webster site I got the spammy/buggy ad thing that kept popping up. A warning would be nice. Anyway, get more packs for the app, please.

title.label: What happened to the updates and new puzzles??

content.label: Any idea when new puzzles will be released?  Or is it one of those fun game apps that eventually stops putting out updates or new content and gets deleted from my phone. I don‚Äôt want to do that because I love this game!  Come back!

title.label: Good but downsides destroy game play

content.label:
I‚Äôve been playing this since it came out.  I‚Äôve bought all the word packs.  Challenging.  One of the few games that keeps me playing well after I intended to stop.

But, the full page, timed ads for gambling cross a line.  I‚Äôm not playing for free.  I deserve an ad-free game experience.  The gambling ads are deceptive and designed to draw people in to gambling.  The odds have got to be terrible but stock photo people winning $2,000 to $52,000 are lies.  How much money will you lose?

I object to the ads when I pay for typeshift puzzles.  I object to the slimy gambling ads.  Can‚Äôt give this a higher rating than 2.

title.label: Fun & challenging, when it fits on the screen

content.label: I was enjoying this game for a few weeks until the puzzles starting blasting out past the sides of my screen, rendering them useless. There was an update today saying it was adding support for XS Max, which it had been working fine on until a few days ago, but puzzles still are off the screen. If things go back to normal I may adjust this review, but for now it gets an "it was great, until‚Ä¶"
Newest update has caused my letters to be stretched off screen on my iPhone xs max
I've really enjoyed completing the daily puzzle, but the app hasn't been adjusted to fit an iPhone XR and I can't see the letters on the ends.

No longer works on new iPhones. iPhone Xr has bigger screen, yet the app actual overcompensates for some reason and the playing area is bigger than the screen, meaning you don't see all the letters. So can't play any more. Contacted developer but never heard back.

title.label: Unique and a lot of fun but I can't restore my purchase

content.label:
I love this game! It's unique and a lot of fun. I also think it's awesome that you get five clues for watching a short video instead of just one, like most games. I just have a problem I need help with and a couple changes I would like.

I love the clue puzzles and purchased the nut package. I wanted more but I would have to buy them separately for $1.99 each. I've tried three times to restore my purchases and each time it tells me that they have been restored, but they haven't. 

Besides that, I wish you had another clue package for purchase. I know you have some free ones, but they are too hard and I can't solve them. I would love some regular puzzles with less letters.

I really love your game and want to keep playing! 

Thank you!
I am slightly addicted to clue puzzles. Word puzzles, not so much.

title.label: Paid to remove ads, but pop ups during gameplay

content.label:
I paid for a pack to remove the ads, but during every gameplay session, I get ads that open safari automatically and present a scammy ‚ÄúAmazon gift card‚Äù page. 

I suspect that the underlying web view used for the Miriam Webster dictionary is the culprit, but even still, that‚Äôs no excuse.
This is truly my new addiction! From easy to challenging I love ‚Äòem all.
Love this challenging word puzzle!!

Some games, or packs, are really challenging, and some are easier, so if you‚Äôre stuck on an impossible one, you can bolster your ego with an easier one before you go back to breaking rocks.  Really enjoying this game.

Typeshift is a quality game, with a variety of challenging daily games that stretches your vocabulary.

It‚Äôs a game everyone should try!

title.label: Loved it till the ADs and Game Center

content.label: ... overwhelmed the game. Can‚Äôt even play it anymore.
This game keeps me on my toes and thinking!
